item.title: Dumping Hashes on Win2k8 R2 x64 with Metasploit
item.author: mubix
item.description: When trying to dump password hashes on a Windows 2008 R2 64 bit box I constantly run into the “The parameter is incorrect” error in meterpreter. So I’ve had to fall back on dropping binaries which I really don’t like doing because of the added clean up and chance of getting ‘caught’. Well, with a bit of migration you’ll be back to passing the hash. Here is how, with a bit of the thought process first:
